name: part_002
file: tmp_hololive production x DreamHack Melbourne 2024： Down Under [Free Preview] [IQqAbuGvDHM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Pre-show waiting screen with an informational loop in Japanese and English, showing hololive production members and concert rules.
The pre-show music continues as a voice-over addresses the audience right before the start of the next segment.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: Please wait a while until the performance starts.

subtitles.original:
PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING
PLEASE BE AWARE OF FLASHING LIGHTS THAT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT AND/OR SEIZURES FOR THOSE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY
subtitles.english:
PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING
PLEASE BE AWARE OF FLASHING LIGHTS THAT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT AND/OR SEIZURES FOR THOSE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: For production reasons, please be careful of flashing lights.

subtitles.original:
YOU ARE FREE TO TAKE SCREENSHOTS.
SCREEN RECORDINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED.
subtitles.english:
YOU ARE FREE TO TAKE SCREENSHOTS.
SCREEN RECORDINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED.

subtitles.original:
スクリーンショットをSNSにアップロード投稿OKです
録音、録画、ミラー配信や違法アップロードは固く禁止いたします
subtitles.english:
Screenshots are OK to post on SNS.
Audio recording, video recording, mirror distribution, and illegal uploads are strictly prohibited.
